Precondition:
1. User must be logged in
2. User must be on blog page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to blog page
2. Enter "Manager" in search field
3. Press Enter
Expected Outcome:
1. URL should be "https://merojob.com/blog/search/?q=Manager"
2. Search Results text should be visible
3. Article "Things Hiring Managers Expect During a Job Interview" should be visible
Postcondition:
1. Search results are maintained until new search
2. Search term is preserved in URL
3. User can perform new search or navigate back

Test Steps:
1. Click on user profile icon
2. Wait for dropdown menu
3. Click logout button
Expected Outcome:
1. User should be redirected to homepage (https://merojob.com/)
2. "Employer Zone" button should be visible
Postcondition:
1. User session is terminated
2. All authenticated features are inaccessible
3. Browser cache and cookies for the session are cleared
4. System is ready for new login
